name: Mimikyu V
author: Eske Yoshinob

abilities.name: Dummy Doll
abilities.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand onto your Bench during your turn, you may prevent all damage done to this Mimikyu V by attacks from your opponent’s Pokémon until the end of your opponent’s next turn.

attacks.name: Jealous Eyes
attacks.effect: Put 3 damage counters on your opponent’s Active Pokémon for each Prize card your opponent has taken.

rule_box: When your Pokémon V is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
